item.description:
FIELD & WILLEY SATURDAY 5/23/09 - Strenuous - Limit 10

Depart Crawford Depot on Route 302 in Crawford North and take
the Avalon Trail for 2.8 to Mt Field Field then go 1.4 over to
Mt Willey which has a nice view and return back the same.

Hike in is 4.2 miles each way/Round trip is 8 miles. Allow 6-7 hours. Gain is 3,050 feet.



CARPOOLS
6:15AM Dascomb Road Commuter Parking Lot Andover MA

(*directions below)

6:30 AM Walmart Newington NH
7:15 AM Depart Hannaford parking lot off Exit 14/Ft Eddy
Rd Concord NH
9:15 AM Crawford Depot

*Directions: Andover, MA - Dascomb Rd. Commuter Parking Lot
(off Rte 93)
Take 93 to the Dascomb Road exit (Andover/Tewksbury). If
taking 93 South, take a left at the end of the exit. The
parking lot is on your left. If heading north on 93, take a
left at the end of the exit, then your first right after going
back under 93 (at the lights). The parking lot is on your
right, alongside 93 south. Dascomb Rd is 2 exits south of Rte
495 and 6 exits north of 128 on Rte 93 (the exit after the lane
drop in Wilmington, MA).

Hike Leader: Diane King Please rsvp with
dianeking2008@comcast.net

let me know if you are driving straight to the trailhead or which carpool you are meeting at.

Andover carpool can meet us in Concord to further reduce cars.
item.how_to_find_us: Hike Leaders: Diane K and Judi Meet them in the parking lot.
item.name: FIELD & WILLEY SATURDAY 5/23/09
